version_description:
Updated the navigation engine to the latest version. Routes should build faster and better. :)
Contour lines and mountain tops can show elevation in feet.

Updated the navigation engine to the latest version. Routes should build faster and better. :)
Contour lines and mountain tops can show elevation in feet.

Updated the navigation engine to the latest version. Routes should build faster and better. :)
Contour lines and mountain tops can show elevation in feet.
Fixed crash in MapCSS parser. Error in UTF8 symbols handled correctly.

You can now switch the map source on the route planning screen.
Fixed a rare crash in the contour lines.

Text appears faster after starting the app and after restoring from the background.
Street name spacing has been improved.

Text appears faster after starting the app and after restoring from the background.
